idea-plugin.name: Android Form Factor Toggler
idea-plugin.description:
Adds a handle to Android Studio's toolbar which toggles between phone and tablet mode of the connected device (physical or emulator).

Usage options:
  • Click on the [[] icon in the toolbar (see screenshots on plugin homepage).
  • Search for "Enable Tablet Mode" / "Enable Phone Mode" in "Find actions". (OSX: CMD+SHIFT+A, Win/Linux: CTRL+SHIFT+A)
